channel.title: Need help on deleting item
channel.description:
I've been coding a barrows chest. Except i need help. When you chest, you keep the key, otherwise clicking and clicking to get a full inventory of barrows items. How can i make it delete the key? The ID of the key is 7678. I even tried this.
[code]deleteItem(7678, 1, 1);[/code
That doesn't work.[/code]

item.title: Need help on deleting item
item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

client.java:18024: orphaned case case 130: // Clicking some stuff in game ^ client.java:24263: illegal start of expression private int somejunk; ^ 2 errors

THIS IS UNDER OBJECTCLICKONE.

case 6774: if (objectID == 10284) { int[] itemsR = {4734, 4757, 4718, 4722, 4716, 4720, 4708, 4710, 4712, 4714, 4753, 4755, 4759, 4745, 4747, 4749, 4751, 4736, 4738, 4726, 4728, 4730, 4724}; int i = (int) (Math.random() * itemR.length); addItem(itemsR[i], 1); sendMessage("Congratulations! Here is your prize."); teleportToX = 2845; teleportToY = 4832; } else { sendMessage("You need the key to open the barrows chest."); } break;

Read full topic
